era:creation-primeval:creation-vocation:.title: Light and darkness are separated and time begins to tick
Skies, seas, and fertile ground emerge in rhythm
Creatures fill sea, sky, and land with abundance
Humans receive God’s image and co-rule mandate

era:creation-primeval:garden-beginnings:.title: Eden is planted as a sanctuary-workshop
Marriage covenant launches a new household
Serpent deception fractures trust and exile follows
Promise of a wounded rescuer is whispered

era:creation-primeval:from-cities-to-flo.title: Cain builds a city even as mercy marks his exile
Generations advance craft, music, and revenge
Noah builds an ark while culture mocks the warning
Waters reset the earth and a rainbow seals covenant

era:creation-primeval:nations-disperse:0.title: Noah’s family replants vineyards and trades blessing & folly
Nations list details families spreading with unique gifts
Tower builders chase fame and are scattered with new tongues
Abram hears the call to leave home for an unseen land

era:patriarchs:abraham-s-journey:01.title: Abram leaves Ur and raises an altar at Shechem

era:patriarchs:abraham-s-journey:02.title: Famine drives a risky trip to Egypt and back

era:patriarchs:abraham-s-journey:03.title: Covenant of pieces seals promises under the stars

era:patriarchs:abraham-s-journey:04.title: Visitors announce Isaac and judge the cities of the plain

era:patriarchs:promise-tested-secured:01.title: Hagar meets God in the desert and names Him “The God who sees”

era:patriarchs:promise-tested-secured:02.title: Circumcision sign marks the household as set apart

era:patriarchs:promise-tested-secured:03.title: Isaac is offered on Moriah and rescued by a ram

era:patriarchs:promise-tested-secured:04.title: Sarah’s field becomes a burial site anchoring the land

era:patriarchs:jacob-transformed:01.title: Jacob bargains for a birthright over stew

era:patriarchs:jacob-transformed:02.title: A ladder dream at Bethel assures divine presence

era:patriarchs:jacob-transformed:03.title: Years with Laban forge a large yet conflicted family

era:patriarchs:jacob-transformed:04.title: Wrestling at Peniel leaves Jacob limping yet blessed

era:patriarchs:joseph-preserves-the-clan.title: Dreams of sheaves and stars fuel brothers’ jealousy
Joseph is sold, resists temptation, and is imprisoned
Interpretation of royal dreams leads to a new post
Famine reunites the family in Goshen with forgiveness

era:exodus-sinai:deliverer-prepared:01.title: Baby Moses is hidden, discovered, and adopted

era:exodus-sinai:deliverer-prepared:02.title: Years in Midian hone humility and shepherd skills

era:exodus-sinai:deliverer-prepared:03.title: Burning bush encounter reveals “I AM” and a mission

era:exodus-sinai:deliverer-prepared:04.title: Moses debates God yet finally returns to Egypt

era:exodus-sinai:egypt-confronted:01.title: Staffs become serpents before hardened hearts

era:exodus-sinai:egypt-confronted:02.title: Blood, frogs, and gnats disgrace Nile gods

era:exodus-sinai:egypt-confronted:03.title: Passover night marks homes with lamb’s blood

era:exodus-sinai:egypt-confronted:04.title: Exodus begins as slaves walk out laden with gifts

era:exodus-sinai:into-the-wilderness-cla.title: Red Sea parts, Miriam leads songs of victory
Manna and quail rhythms teach trust and Sabbath rest
Amalek attacks and hands are raised for victory
Jethro mentors Moses on shared leadership

era:exodus-sinai:sinai-covenant-dwelling.title: Thunderous glory rests on Sinai as people pledge obedience
Golden calf crisis sparks intercession and renewed mercy
Artisans craft a tabernacle from willing offerings
Cloud and fire settle on the completed dwelling

era:wilderness-conquest:lessons-in-trust.title: Spies survey Canaan and the crowd chooses fear
Korah’s revolt challenges authority and ends dramatically
Rock is struck twice and leadership consequences follow
Bronze serpent lifts hope amid poisonous bites

era:wilderness-conquest:east-side-victor.title: Battles with Sihon and Og secure land east of the Jordan
God turns Balaam's curses into blessings
Baal Peor rebellion ends when Phinehas intervenes
New census, inheritance rulings, and Joshua's commissioning

era:wilderness-conquest:crossing-and-rem.title: Jordan River stops as priests stand with the ark
Stones from the river become a memorial at Gilgal
Covenant signs are renewed before Passover in the land
Manna ends as people eat the land’s produce

era:wilderness-conquest:campaigns-allotm.title: Jericho’s walls fall after worshipful marches
Ai exposes hidden sin then becomes a victory
Southern and northern coalitions are defeated
Land is allotted, cities of refuge named, and Joshua issues a final challenge

era:judges-kingdom:cycles-of-deliverance.title: Othniel launches the pattern of rest and relapse
Ehud assassinates a tyrant with a hidden dagger
Deborah and Barak partner to bring victory and song

era:judges-kingdom:from-chaos-to-hope:01.title: Jephthah negotiates and laments a rash vow

era:judges-kingdom:from-chaos-to-hope:02.title: Samson wages solo wars against the Philistines

era:judges-kingdom:from-chaos-to-hope:03.title: Dark tales of civil strife reveal the need for a king

era:judges-kingdom:from-chaos-to-hope:04.title: Ruth and Boaz illustrate loyal love and lineage

era:judges-kingdom:samuel-bridges-the-er.title: Hannah’s prayer and dedication bring Samuel to Shiloh

God thunders against Philistines as Israel repents

era:judges-kingdom:saul-and-david:01.title: Saul wins early battles yet disobeys and is rejected

era:judges-kingdom:saul-and-david:02.title: David serves in Saul’s court and faces Goliath

era:judges-kingdom:saul-and-david:03.title: David gains friends, flees, and spares Saul twice

era:judges-kingdom:saul-and-david:04.title: Saul falls on Mount Gilboa and David mourns

era:united-monarchy:david-s-reign:02.title: Jerusalem becomes political and worship center

era:united-monarchy:david-s-reign:04.title: Sin with Bathsheba brings confession and consequences

era:united-monarchy:family-turmoil-hope:.title: Amnon assaults Tamar and Absalom plots revenge
Absalom steals hearts and David flees the city

Temple preparation plans are handed to Solomon

era:united-monarchy:solomon-s-glory:01.title: Solomon requests wisdom and receives abundance

era:united-monarchy:solomon-s-glory:03.title: Temple construction engages artisans for seven years

era:united-monarchy:solomon-s-glory:04.title: Dedication prayer invites heaven to hear prayers

era:united-monarchy:seeds-of-division:01.title: Queen of Sheba marvels at wisdom and wealth

era:united-monarchy:seeds-of-division:02.title: Foreign wives pull Solomon toward idolatry

era:united-monarchy:seeds-of-division:04.title: Jeroboam receives a prophecy of future rule

era:divided-kingdom:split-and-struggle:0.title: Rehoboam doubles the yoke; ten tribes secede under Jeroboam

era:divided-kingdom:elijah-elisha-era:03.title: Still small voice restores the weary prophet

era:divided-kingdom:elijah-elisha-era:04.title: Elisha receives the mantle and multiplies miracles

Babylon rises, Jehoiachin surrenders, and Jerusalem ultimately falls

era:exile-return:faith-in-foreign-courts.title: Daniel interprets dreams and preserves kings

era:exile-return:first-return:03.title: Foundation is laid with mixed tears and shouts

era:exile-return:first-return:04.title: Prophets Haggai and Zechariah restart the work

era:exile-return:protection-in-persia:01.title: Esther becomes queen against all odds

era:exile-return:protection-in-persia:03.title: Purim is established to remember deliverance

People confess, celebrate booths, and sign covenant
Malachi calls for wholehearted worship and future hope

era:messiah:big-picture:01.title: Birth narratives highlight humility and wonder

era:messiah:big-picture:02.title: Public ministry displays authority over sickness and storms

era:messiah:big-picture:03.title: Apprentices are formed into a kingdom team

era:messiah:big-picture:04.title: Passion, cross, and resurrection secure redemption

era:apostolic-church:church-launched:01.title: Upper room community prays and appoints Matthias

era:apostolic-church:church-launched:02.title: Spirit descends at Pentecost and Peter proclaims Jesus

era:apostolic-church:church-launched:03.title: Three thousand respond, share possessions, and devote to teaching

era:apostolic-church:church-launched:04.title: Lame man at the Beautiful Gate rises and praises God

era:apostolic-church:church-launched:05.title: Sanhedrin threats lead to a shaking prayer meeting

era:apostolic-church:church-launched:06.title: Ananias and Sapphira's deceit ends abruptly

era:apostolic-church:church-launched:07.title: Angel frees jailed apostles as signs multiply across Jerusalem

era:apostolic-church:church-launched:08.title: Seven Spirit-filled servants organize daily bread for widows

era:apostolic-church:church-launched:09.title: Stephen retells Israel's story and is martyred forgiving enemies

era:apostolic-church:church-launched:10.title: Persecution scatters believers who carry good news through Judea and Samaria

era:apostolic-church:church-launched:11.title: Philip explains Isaiah to an Ethiopian official who is baptized

era:apostolic-church:church-launched:12.title: Saul encounters the risen Jesus on the Damascus road and regains sight

era:apostolic-church:church-launched:13.title: Peter heals Aeneas and raises Tabitha along the coast

era:apostolic-church:mission-formation:0.title: Antioch prophets fast and commission Barnabas and Saul
Cyprus journey confronts Bar-Jesus and wins Sergius Paulus
Pisidian Antioch sermon invites Gentiles amid rising opposition
Iconium plots and Lystra stoning stretch the first mission
Derbe visit ends with elders appointed in every new church
Paul writes Galatians defending grace for the young assemblies
Jerusalem Council debates inclusion and drafts a freeing letter
Paul and Silas revisit the congregations and enlist Timothy
Night vision of a Macedonian man redirects the team to Europe

era:apostolic-church:mission-formation:1.title: Lydia and her household believe beside the Philippi riverbank
Philippian jailer embraces Jesus after the midnight earthquake
Thessalonian riots and Berean eagerness shape the itinerary
Areopagus address names the unknown God and resurrection hope
Eighteen months in Corinth establish a resilient multiethnic church
Paul writes 1 Thessalonians to steady persecuted disciples
2 Thessalonians clarifies the Day of the Lord and daily work
Priscilla and Aquila coach Apollos before Ephesus receives the Spirit
Extraordinary miracles and scroll-burning renunciations mark Ephesus
Paul writes 1 Corinthians confronting factions and immorality

era:apostolic-church:mission-formation:2.title: Painful visits lead to 2 Corinthians, restoring trust and generosity
Trade riot over Artemis exposes the gospel's economic impact
Troas gathering and Eutychus' rescue precede the Miletus farewell
Paul writes Romans outlining the gospel before delivering aid
Jerusalem rumors spark a temple arrest despite vows for peace
Sanhedrin hearings and assassination plots push Paul into custody
Felix and Festus interviews keep Paul confined at Caesarea
Appeal to Caesar sends Paul onto a guarded voyage
Storm and shipwreck on Malta reveal God's protection
Rome house arrest welcomes guests while the message runs free

era:apostolic-church:mission-formation:3.title: Ephesians, Colossians, and Philemon carry prison-shaped maturity
Philippians letter overflows with joy amid captivity
Paul mentors Timothy and Titus through pastoral letters
Hebrews homily urges weary believers to hold fast
1 Peter encourages scattered exiles to stand firm in suffering
2 Peter warns churches about corrupt teachers before martyrdom
Paul's final imprisonment births 2 Timothy as a farewell charge
Jude calls believers to contend for the original faith
Jerusalem's fall in AD 70 reshapes the community's imagination
John shepherds Asia and pens letters of love and discernment

era:apostolic-church:future-hope:01.title: John is exiled to Patmos while worshiping on the Lord's Day

era:apostolic-church:future-hope:02.title: Vision of the risen Jesus commissions letters to the churches

era:apostolic-church:future-hope:03.title: Seven messages confront compromise and encourage repentance

era:apostolic-church:future-hope:04.title: Heaven's throne opens and the Lamb receives the sealed scroll

era:apostolic-church:future-hope:05.title: Seal, trumpet, and bowl sequences unveil God's measured judgments

era:apostolic-church:future-hope:06.title: 144,000 are sealed and a countless multitude worships before the throne

era:apostolic-church:future-hope:08.title: Babylon falls and the wedding supper celebrates God's justice

era:apostolic-church:future-hope:09.title: Heaven opens and the rider on the white horse defeats evil powers

era:apostolic-church:future-hope:10.title: New heaven and new earth descend as God dwells with His people

era:exodus-sinai:egypt-confronted:07.title: Flies and livestock disease draw a boundary around Goshen

era:exile-return:chronicler-retells.title: Chronicler retells Israel's story for a new day

era:exile-return:chronicler-retells:01.title: Genealogies from Adam to post-exile remnant trace covenant identity

era:exile-return:chronicler-retells:02.title: David's mighty men, ark processions, and choir divisions model holistic worship

era:exile-return:chronicler-retells:03.title: Temple blueprints, offerings, and leadership charges empower Solomon

era:exile-return:chronicler-retells:04.title: Solomon's wisdom, wealth, and dedication inspire awe toward the temple

era:exile-return:chronicler-retells:05.title: Judah's kings are evaluated by fidelity to the house of God

era:exile-return:chronicler-retells:06.title: Hezekiah and Josiah lead revival cycles pointing to future hope

era:exile-return:chronicler-retells:07.title: Fall of Jerusalem and Cyrus' decree close the chronicle with a call to rebuild

era:patriarchs:job-tested:01.title: Job is described as blameless and becomes a target of heavenly accusation

era:patriarchs:job-tested:02.title: In a single day Job loses wealth, children, and health yet refuses to curse God

era:patriarchs:job-tested:03.title: Friends debate justice while Job protests innocence and longs for a mediator

era:patriarchs:job-tested:04.title: Elihu reframes suffering; God speaks from the whirlwind about wisdom and power

era:patriarchs:job-tested:05.title: Job repents, intercedes for friends, and is restored with deeper humility

era:united-monarchy:davidic-worship:01.title: David pens psalms while hiding in caves and leading warriors

era:united-monarchy:davidic-worship:02.title: Sons of Korah and Asaph establish choirs, instruments, and daily praise

era:united-monarchy:davidic-worship:03.title: Festal psalms celebrate Zion, enthronement, and covenant promises

era:united-monarchy:davidic-worship:04.title: Laments and penitential psalms give language for grief and repentance

era:united-monarchy:davidic-worship:05.title: Hallel, wisdom, and pilgrimage psalms train generations in worship

era:united-monarchy:solomonic-wisdom:01.title: Proverbs teach rulers to prize the fear of Yahweh over shortcuts

era:united-monarchy:solomonic-wisdom:02.title: Hezekiah's scribes preserve additional sayings from sages across Israel

era:united-monarchy:solomonic-wisdom:03.title: Ecclesiastes surveys toil and pleasure before urging reverent obedience

era:united-monarchy:solomonic-wisdom:04.title: Song of Songs celebrates covenant love, mutual desire, and faithful delight

era:divided-kingdom:last-days-of-judah:0.title: Jeremiah weeps in acrostic laments over fallen Jerusalem

era:divided-kingdom:prophetic-voices:01.title: Hosea and Amos plead with the north for loyal love and justice

era:divided-kingdom:prophetic-voices:02.title: Joel and Obadiah warn Judah and Edom about the Day of Yahweh

era:divided-kingdom:prophetic-voices:03.title: Isaiah comforts Ahaz with Immanuel and envisions a global kingdom

era:divided-kingdom:prophetic-voices:04.title: Micah indicts corrupt leaders yet promises a Bethlehem ruler

era:divided-kingdom:prophetic-voices:05.title: Nahum and Zephaniah announce judgment on Nineveh and all prideful nations

era:divided-kingdom:prophetic-voices:06.title: Habakkuk wrestles with Babylon's rise and learns to live by faith

era:exile-return:prophets-by-the-river:0.title: Ezekiel beholds wheels within wheels and is commissioned as a watchman
Symbolic sign-acts dramatize Jerusalem's siege and scattered exiles
Oracles against nations promise that Yahweh alone is Lord
Dry bones live and two sticks unite as restoration hope is preached
A new temple vision shows glory returning to a renewed land

era:divided-kingdom:last-days-of-judah:0.title: Jeremiah delivers temple sermons, letters to exiles, and buys a field as hope

era:exile-return:prophets-of-renewal.title: Prophets of renewal stir the remnant

era:exile-return:prophets-of-renewal:01.title: Haggai calls builders back to the temple with promised glory

era:exile-return:prophets-of-renewal:02.title: Zechariah shares night visions, crowns Joshua, and points to the coming Branch
